Class LinkService

java.lang.Object
com.powerbi.api.service.LinkService
@Service public class LinkService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing Link entities. Handles operations such as retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting links for a specific user.

  • Method Details

    • getUserLinks

      public List<Link> getUserLinks(String username, String search)
      Retrieves all links associated with the given user.
      Parameters:
      username - the user whose links are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of Link entities belonging to the user

    • getUserLink

      public Link getUserLink(String username, Long linkId)
      Retrieves a specific link for the user by its ID. Ensures that the link belongs to the user.
      Parameters:
      username - the user who owns the link
      linkId - the ID of the link to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the Link entity if found and belongs to the user
      Throws:
      org.springframework.data.rest.webmvc.ResourceNotFoundException - if the link is not found or does not belong to the user

    • createUserLink

      public Link createUserLink(String username, LinkDTO linkDTO)
      Creates a new link for the user.
      Parameters:
      username - the user creating the link
      linkDTO - the data transfer object containing link details
      Returns:
      the created Link entity

    • updateUserLink

      public Link updateUserLink(String username, LinkDTO linkDTO)
      Updates an existing link for the user. Ensures that the link belongs to the user before updating.
      Parameters:
      username - the user updating the link
      linkDTO - the data transfer object containing updated link details
      Returns:
      the updated Link entity
      Throws:
      org.springframework.data.rest.webmvc.ResourceNotFoundException - if the link is not found or does not belong to the user

    • deleteUserLink

      public void deleteUserLink(String username, Long linkId)
      Deletes a link for the user. Ensures that the link belongs to the user before deleting.
      Parameters:
      username - the user requesting the deletion
      linkId - the ID of the link to be deleted
      Throws:
      org.springframework.data.rest.webmvc.ResourceNotFoundException - if the link is not found or does not belong to the user
